Reviews.Title: problems
Reviews.Author: Robin Allen
Reviews.Content: Some of the drivers either don'e work or were not installed. The mouse and touchpadcontrols do not function properly. One recurring problem is that the left click button will trigger itself without warning causing everything the cursor passes over to be clicked on. When typing this report the mouse left click button fired many times causing the text cursor to jump to another position. Sometimes this required me to stop, delete and retype. Other times it deleted entire lines of text. Very frustrating.

Reviews.Title: both seller and product excellent
Reviews.Author: chaydel
Reviews.Content: Seller Link-tronics shipped same day of order and also answered a pre-sale question very promptly. The laptop was packaged securely. I would definitely order from them again.The Dell E6400 looks new; which I didn't really expect, so that's a bonus. The specs are exactly as were stated in the description. Boots up fast and no bloatware. No barrage of pop up windows and marketing yap to get rid of. Comes with Open Office. All Windows Updates were installed, and I was able to use the machine right out of the box. For my purposes, it is an excellent buy. I use this to type and surf on. I do not play hardware intensive games, so cannot speak to that aspect.

Reviews.Title: met my needs
Reviews.Author: Margie J. Acree
Reviews.Content: I find it to be just what I was looking for. I can stay close to my disabled Mom and still surf the web, pay bills,read and answer emails.

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude good value
Reviews.Author: Laura Klouzek
Reviews.Content: Easy to get going.  Included all as indicated.  Touch pad is a little touchy, but a good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Very used condition
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: Comes with nothing but a very used computer.  I was expecting a gently used, decent laptop. Just know what you're getting.
